name: Flick Basketball Challenge
description:
Flick the slider with your finger or slide it forward by holding down your finger on the slider, pulling back to set the amount of power to use, and then lifting up your finger for the shot/pass. If the slider lands within range of the target, you've scored!

How to Play:
1. Press the basketball
2. Drag on the screen to adjust the shooting trajectory
3. Release finger to shoot basketball towards the basket

Features:
- Easy to pick-up, challenging to master
- Easy fun controls
- Great arcade physics
- Beautiful graphics
- Amazing sound design and music
